# Canonical: https://arifos.arif-fazil.com
# MCP Spec: https://spec.modelcontextprotocol.io/specification/2024-11-05/

SITE IDENTITY & PURPOSE

Site: arifos.arif-fazil.com
Layer: APPS (Mind Agent - Claude)
Role: Technical documentation, API specification, builder integration guide
Sovereign: Muhammad Arif bin Fazil (F13 Constitutional Authority)
Status: v55.2-SEAL (Production Implementation)
Date: 2026-02-02

SYSTEM OVERVIEW: arifOS GOVERNANCE KERNEL

arifOS is a SOVEREIGN, CONSTITUTIONAL AI governance kernel that:
? Operates on 13 Constitutional Floors (F1-F13)
? Processes decisions through 000-999 Metabolic Loop
? Achieves consensus via Three Engines (?-O-?)
? Measures every decision quantitatively
? Witnesses all choices with Byzantine consensus (F3)
? Seals all verdicts cryptographically (Ed25519, BLS)
? Maintains immutable audit trail (VAULT-999)

Core Philosophy:
   Structure creates freedom. Governance enables autonomy.
  Intelligence is a high-pressure resource requiring piping, cooling, and verification.

THE AAA MCP ARCHITECTURE (Agents, API, Architecture)

AGENTS:
  System: arifOS Kernel (Python 3.12 - FastAPI on Railway)
  Location: aaamcp.arif-fazil.com
  Status: Production (v55.2-SEAL)
  Database: VAULT-999 Merkle DAG (encrypted ledger)

  Sub-Agents:
    - Kimi (HUMAN): arif-fazil.com
    - Claude (MIND): arifos.arif-fazil.com
    - Python (SOUL): apex.arif-fazil.com

API SPECIFICATION (MCP v1.0):
  Protocol: Model Context Protocol v1.0
  Transport: JSON-RPC 2.0 over HTTP/WebSocket
  Authentication: Ed25519 signatures (F1 Amanah)
  Authorization: Byzantine consensus (F3 Tri-Witness)
  Base URL: https://aaamcp.arif-fazil.com/v1

ARCHITECTURE STACK (7 Layers):
  L7: AGI/ASI Layer (Final Verdict)
  L6: Governance Layer (Constitutional Floors F1-F13)
  L5: Semantic Layer (Meaning ;& Intent)
  L4: Logic Layer (Reasoning ;& Proof)
  L3: Cryptography Layer (Trust ;& Signatures)
  L2: Math Layer (Structure ;& Geometry)
  L1: Physics Layer (Thermodynamic Constraints)

NINE EXPLICIT MCP TOOLS (v55.2)

1. init_reboot (000): Session bootstrap, injection defense (F1)
2. agi_sense (111): Input parsing, intent detection (F4)
3. agi_think (222): Hypothesis generation, divergent reasoning
4. agi_reason (333): Deep logic, convergent proof (F2, F7)
5. asi_empathize (444): Stakeholder modeling, impact mapping (F6)
6. asi_align (555): Constitutional compliance check (F1-F13)
7. asi_insight (666): Risk ;& consequence analysis (F5)
8. apex_verdict (888): Final judgment ;& cryptographic sealing (F13)
   Verdicts: SEAL - VOID - SABAR - 888_HOLD
9. reality_search: External fact-checking (F2)

METABOLIC LOOP PIPELINE EXECUTION

Standard Flow:
  init_reboot (000) to [ARIF - ADAM parallel] to threshold (777) to apex_verdict (888) to finalize (999)

Parallel Processing:
  ARIF Pipeline: agi_sense to agi_think to agi_reason
  ADAM Pipeline: asi_empathize to asi_align to asi_insight
  Both complete, then F3 tri-witness consensus, then APEX judgment

Total Execution: ~24-30 seconds (parallel)

CRYPTOGRAPHIC SECURITY ;& VAULT-999

Signature Scheme:
  Root Key (F1): Ed25519 (RFC 8032)
  Authority Sig (F11): BLS Aggregate (Boneh-Lynn-Shacham)
  Merkle DAG (F12): SHA3-256 hash chain

VAULT-999 Ledger:
  hash_n = SHA3(hash_{n-1} - state_n - timestamp_n)
  Immutable, tamper-proof, complete traceability
  Per entry: timestamp, verdict, hash, signature, F13 auth, explanation

DEPLOYMENT CONFIGURATION

Technology Stack:
  Runtime: Python 3.12
  Framework: FastAPI v0.104+
  Database: PostgreSQL (VAULT-999) - Redis (cache)
  Deployment: Railway.app (continuous from GitHub)
  CI/CD: GitHub Actions
  Monitoring: Sentry - CloudFlare Analytics

Deployment Instructions:
  1. Clone github.com/ariffazil/arifOS
  2. pip install -r requirements.txt
  3. Set environment variables
  4. uvicorn app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
  5. Railway.app auto-deploys on git push to main

BUILDER INTEGRATION GUIDE

Step 1: Authentication
  - Generate Ed25519 keypair
  - Register with arifOS (F1 gate)
  - Include signature in all requests

Step 2: Call the Tools
  - Use MCP-compatible client library
  - Start with init_reboot (000)
  - Chain tools per 000-999 pipeline
  - End with apex_verdict (888)

Step 3: Handle Verdicts
  SEAL: Proceed (authorized)
  VOID: Block (safety violation)
  SABAR: Pause (human reflection needed)
  888_HOLD: Wait (F13 sovereign decision pending)

MONITORING ;& OBSERVABILITY

Metrics:
  - Request latency (P50, P95, P99)
  - Floor violation rate by type
  - Verdict distribution (SEAL/VOID/SABAR)
  - F13 override frequency
  - Tri-witness consensus agreement
  - VAULT-999 ledger growth
  - Signature verification time

  - BLS Signatures: crypto.stanford.edu/~dabo/papers/BLS.html
  - SHA3-256: FIPS 202
